CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y php5-mysql php5-odbc mysql-client zlib1g-dev libmcrypt-dev libicu-dev     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: docker-php-ext-configure intl &&     docker-php-ext-install -j$(nproc) zip mysql mysqli pdo pdo_mysql mcrypt mbstring opcache intl
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -fsSL 'https://xdebug.org/files/xdebug-2.4.0.tgz' -o xdebug.tar.gz     && mkdir -p xdebug     && tar -xf xdebug.tar.gz -C xdebug --strip-components=1     && rm xdebug.tar.gz     && (     cd xdebug     && phpize     && ./configure --enable-xdebug     && make -j$(nproc)     && make install     )     && rm -r xdebug     && docker-php-ext-enable xdebug
Commands.Name: run
